title: The Writer's Almanac for Sunday, January 16, 2022
description: Today is the birthday of three very different modern writers: food writer Ruth Reichl (1948), poet Mary Karr (1955), and activist Susan Sontag (1933).
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: Today is the birthday of three very different modern writers: food writer Ruth Reichl (1948), poet Mary Karr (1955), and activist Susan Sontag (1933).
